title: sap.fe.showcase.worklist
content:
# package.json

```json
{
  "name": "sap.fe.showcase.worklist",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "description": "A SAP Fiori application.",
  "keywords": [
    "ui5",
    "openui5",
    "sapui5"
  ],
  "main": "webapp/index.html",
  "scripts": {
    "deploy-config": "npx -p @sap/ux-ui5-tooling fiori add deploy-config cf",
    "build": "ui5 build preload --clean-dest --config ui5-deploy.yaml",
    "build-local": "ui5 build preload --clean-dest",
    "start": "ui5 serve"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@sap/ux-specification": "UI5-1.127",
    "@sap/ux-ui5-tooling": "^1.14.3",
    "@sapui5/types": "~1.140.0",
    "@ui5/cli": "^4.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.1.6",
    "ui5-task-zipper": "^3.4.1",
    "ui5-tooling-transpile": "^3.7.5"
  },
  "ui5": {
    "dependencies": [
      "ui5-task-zipper",
      "mbt"
    ]
  }
}
```
